sentences.en: At last dancing had become more than an extra and entertaining frill.
sentences.cn: 舞蹈也终于不再是供消遣娱乐的附加装饰.

sentences.en: He pulled out his frill as far as his navel.
sentences.cn: 他把他的皱边一直拉到肚脐上.
(留在下巴底下和两颊的)兜腮胡子 ( 其状如绞索套,故名 )

sentences.en: Now, here's the frill at half staff.
sentences.cn: 现在, 这是半张开的皱褶.

sentences.en: She sewed a frill on the bottom of her skirt.
sentences.cn: 她在裙摆下缝了条褶边.

sentences.en: She was wearing a white blouse with frills at the cuffs.
sentences.cn: 她穿了一件袖口有褶边的白衬衫。

sentences.en: The Clumber has a good neck frill and on no condition should his throat be shaved.
sentences.cn: 克伦伯猎鹬犬拥有良好的颈部装饰,在任何条件下都不能刨除喉咙的毛发.

sentences.en: The frill is that ruff - like collar it to bluff its enemies, like feral cats.
sentences.cn: 皱褶是用于吓唬敌人的轮 状 衣领, 就像野猫一样.

sentences.en: The Protoceratops had a frill on its head. Males had a bigger frill than females.
sentences.cn: 原角龙的头上长着个褶边一样的装饰, 雄性的比雌性的大些.

sentences.en: To make into a ruffle frill.
sentences.cn: 通过压褶做的装饰的皱褶.

sentences.en: To press ridges or narrow pleats into ( a frill, for example ).
sentences.cn: 使布起褶皱把布压成花边或窄的布褶 ( 如褶边 )

sentences.en: We supply basic, no-frills tractors at low prices.
sentences.cn: 我们低价供应没有花哨功能的基本型拖拉机。

sentences.en: When these flowers frill bloom they send forth a fragrance at once delicate and sweet.
sentences.cn: 这些鲜花盛开时,会发出阵阵馥郁的幽香.

trans.tran_cn: 褶边，装饰，[摄]胶片边缘的皱褶，[动]壳皱
trans.tran_en: a decoration that consists of narrow piece of cloth that has many small folds in it
a decoration that consists of narrow piece of cloth that has many small folds in it
